channel.description: Recent content in An Ocean Between Us on

item.title: An Ocean Between Us
item.description: [[songs/t/type_o_negative/october_rust/my_girlfriends_girlfriend.md#go-go-trance-vyl-wnanory|Go]] [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/blurryface/tear_in_my_heart.md#sometimes-you-gotta-bleed-to-know-oh-oh-vyl-wnanory|How many years have we waited for a ship that never set sail?]] [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/blurryface/tear_in_my_heart.md#sometimes-you-gotta-bleed-to-know-oh-oh-vyl-wnanory|How many days have we wasted chasing a love that was not our own?

item.title: Bury Us All
item.description: [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.md#maybe–maybe-you-saw-your-mother-maybe-shes-smiling-vyl-wnanory|I see them coming]] [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.md#maybe–maybe-you-saw-your-mother-maybe-shes-smiling-vyl-wnanory|With shrouds to bury us all]] [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.md#maybe–maybe-you-saw-your-mother-maybe-shes-smiling-vyl-wnanory|Before we were born they shaped our lives]] [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.md#maybe–maybe-you-saw-your-mother-maybe-shes-smiling-vyl-wnanory|Leading us into an unmarked grave]] [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.

item.title: Comfort Betrays
item.description: [[songs/m/monty_python/the_ultimate_monty_python_rip_off/always_look_on_the_bright_side_of_life.md#if-life-seems-jolly-rotten-vyl-wnanory|Rah!]] [[songs/m/monty_python/the_ultimate_monty_python_rip_off/always_look_on_the_bright_side_of_life.md#if-life-seems-jolly-rotten-vyl-wnanory|You sat and watched]] [[songs/m/monty_python/the_ultimate_monty_python_rip_off/always_look_on_the_bright_side_of_life.md#if-life-seems-jolly-rotten-vyl-wnanory|As I nearly destroyed myself]] [[songs/m/monty_python/the_ultimate_monty_python_rip_off/always_look_on_the_bright_side_of_life.md#if-life-seems-jolly-rotten-vyl-wnanory|Never had I felt so betrayed]] [[songs/m/monty_python/the_ultimate_monty_python_rip_off/always_look_on_the_bright_side_of_life.md#if-life-seems-jolly-rotten-vyl-wnanory|That you would sacrifice my life]] [[songs/m/monty_python/the_ultimate_monty_python_rip_off/always_look_on_the_bright_side_of_life.

item.title: Forsaken
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/life__11.md#hey-you-whend-ya-get-so-cold-whend-ya-get-so-cold-vyl-wnanory|Yeahoh]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/victim.md#so-dont-need-your-salvation-with-promises-unkind-vyl-wnanory|I’ve looked straight into your eyes and turned my head for the last time]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/victim.md#so-dont-need-your-salvation-with-promises-unkind-vyl-wnanory|Because I was scared to leave these walls in ruin like the fate of those who trust in themselves]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/victim.

item.title: I Never Wanted
item.description: [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/constellations/parallel_universes.md#i-never-wanted-vyl-wnanory|I never wanted and I never cared before.]] [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/constellations/parallel_universes.md#i-never-wanted-vyl-wnanory|I never wanted and I never cared before.]] [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/constellations/parallel_universes.md#i-never-wanted-vyl-wnanory|Take it back, this is a new day.

item.title: Nothing Left
item.description: [[songs/n/nirvana/nevermind/lithium.md#yeah-yeah-vyl-wnanory|Yeah, yeah]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/motion.md#tired-of-talking–lets-vyl-wnanory|This world was never worthy but how can I call it unfaithful?]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/motion.md#tired-of-talking–lets-vyl-wnanory|Every promise was fulfilled as decay crawled from its throat]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/motion.

item.title: The Sound Of Truth
item.description: Yeah [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/lying_is_the_most_fun_a_girl_can_have_without_taking_her_clothes_off.md#lets-get-these-teen-hearts-beating-vyl-wnanory|We have all heard what we wanted to hear]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/lying_is_the_most_fun_a_girl_can_have_without_taking_her_clothes_off.md#lets-get-these-teen-hearts-beating-vyl-wnanory|Truth that sounds right to our ears]] We have all heard what we wanted to hear Truth that sounds right to our ears [[songs/e/eluveitie/helvetios/santonian_shores.

item.title: This Is Who We Are
item.description: [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_one_that_kills_the_least.md#so-come-with-me-come-with-me-vyl-wnanory|Now this is who we are]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_one_that_kills_the_least.md#so-come-with-me-come-with-me-vyl-wnanory|I am no one’s]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_one_that_kills_the_least.md#so-come-with-me-come-with-me-vyl-wnanory|I am no one’s hero]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_one_that_kills_the_least.md#so-come-with-me-come-with-me-vyl-wnanory|I am no one]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_one_that_kills_the_least.

item.title: Within Destruction
item.description: [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#dont-deny-vyl-wnanory|If music is a mirror revealing the depths of my heart]] [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#dont-deny-vyl-wnanory|Then I will write the darkest song for without forgiveness my soul is lost]] [[songs/p/parcels/parcels/tieduprightnow.

item.title: Wrath Upon Ourselves
item.description: [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/nomadic.md#inside-all-my-flaws-again-i-cant-let-go-vyl-wnanory|I can only imagine that wrath is being held out]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/nomadic.md#inside-all-my-flaws-again-i-cant-let-go-vyl-wnanory|So there will be time for us to be redeemed]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/nomadic.
